name: SCNPhysicsShape.Option
desc: Keys for the options dictionary used when creating a physics shape.

items.name: static let keepAsCompound: SCNPhysicsShape.Option
items.desc: An option for selecting whether to create a group of independent shapes or combine them into a single shape.

items.name: static let scale: SCNPhysicsShape.Option
items.desc: An option for selecting the scale factor of the shape relative to the local coordinate space of the node containing it.

items.name: static let type: SCNPhysicsShape.Option
items.desc: An option for selecting the level of detail at which to create shapes from geometry.

items.name: struct SCNPhysicsShape.ShapeType
items.desc: Values for the type key specifying the level of detail that SceneKit uses when creating a physics shape based on a geometry.
